Package de.oth.blocklib.helper

Class BlockInfo

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.helper.BlockInfo
Direct Known Subclasses:
FluidBlock
public class BlockInfo
extends java.lang.Object
A Wrapper for information regarding a single block in the world. Contains the blocks position (BlockPos), the direction in which the block faces the camera, the blocks metaInfo and additional data.
Author:
Florian Loher

  • Constructor Details

    • BlockInfo

      public BlockInfo​(BlockPos pos, Direction facing, MetaInfo<MetaData> metaInfo, byte additionalData)
      Constructs a BlockInfo using the data it wraps.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the block.
      facing - The direction which faces the camera.
      metaInfo - The meta info of the block.
      additionalData - The addtional data of the block.

    • BlockInfo

      public BlockInfo​(BlockInfo blockInfo)
      Constructs a BlockInfo by making a copy of the provided BlockInfo.
      Parameters:
      blockInfo - The BlockInfo to be copied.
